name: TOKYO GAMING SHOWCASE Album Bundle / Event Series
blurb: Indie game-focused 10-album music bundle, streaming concerts, and coverage of Square Sounds and the Tokyo Game Show.

rewards.reward: BLOG UPDATES:  Get access to our backer-only blog posts.
HALF BUNDLE:  Your choice of either the INDIE SCORE PACK or GAME-INSPIRED PACK of the album bundle, via Bandcamp.
FULL BUNDLE. The INDIE SCORE and GAME-INSPIRED packs.  10+ Digital Albums delivered to you in your file format of choice via Bandcamp.

SF X MM REMIX / FEATURETTE:  Get the above rewards, as well as exclusive first access to A-Rival's official Street Fighter X Mega Man remix album featuring brand new arrangements by Asagen, KUNIO, BOKKADENci, Foilverb and more. To be released at a later date for name your price. In addition, receive a 10-minute Showcase Overview featurette as an m4v file for iPhone and iPad.  A great way to show support for the event series.

CHEAPBEATS & FRIENDS:  Get all the above digital content, along with additional digital rewards from our project partners, including guests of the Tokyo Indie Underground, Dance Party, Kyoto and Osaka shows.  Includes a special collection of music by Japan's Cheapbeats chip music label, the organizers of the Square Sounds music festival in Tokyo.

FLASH DRIVE:  All of the above digital rewards and an 8 GB USB Flash drive filled with music from our tour partners and movie files from our live events.  Will be shipped to your mailing address, with free international shipping included.

MEGA RAN JAPAN TOUR LP:  Receive all of the above digital backer rewards (not including the 8 GB Flash Drive) and also receive the Mega Ran Japan Tour LP on CD.  Be among the first to get a copy when it ships later this year, featuring remixes by Hige Driver, Bokkadenci, TORIENA, NNNNNNNNNN, DJ Master Kohta, Foilverb and more.

MEGA RAN JAPAN TOUR BLU-RAY:  All of the above digital rewards (excluding the Flash drive and CD), along with a copy of the Mega Ran Japan Tour all-region Blu-ray documentary, featuring live performances and interviews.  Your name will be included in the credits of the Tokyo Gaming Showcase featurette.  The Blu-ray ships in April of 2014, with this tier limited to 50 backers.

SHOWCASE REWARD BUNDLE:  Receive all of the above physical backer rewards, including the 8 GB Flash drive, and CD and Blu-ray from Mega Ran, along with a selection of CDs from Japan, courtesy of our tour partners.  Your name will be included in the credits of the Tokyo Gaming Showcase featurette.  This tier is limited to just 30 backers so that we can include limited edition compact discs from Japan.

SIGNED CD BUNDLE:  All of the above and CDs signed by Tokyo Gaming Showcase tour partners.  In addition, you will receive not one but two different all-region Blu-ray documentaries from the makers of the Mega Ran Japan Tour for use with your Blu-ray player or PlayStation 3.  An extremely limited supply, available to just 20 backers of the TGS initiative.

A_RIVAL REMIX:  All of the above digital rewards, the Mega Ran Japan Tour Blu-Ray, the Mega Ran Japan Tour LP on CD, the 8GB Flash Drive and a very special bonus. A_Rival will cover a song from a game of your choice in the style of Street Fighter X Mega Man.

TOP BACKER TIER:  Receive all of the backer rewards outside of the custom remix, and contribute as a top tier supporter of the Tokyo Gaming Showcase Album Bundle and Event Series.  Get a mention on our Ustream broadcasts, twitter and facebook shout-outs and if you have a favorite artist joining the event series your requests will be reflected in our featurette coverage.  We will set aside very limited edition items from our tour partners for this tier as an expression of thanks for making the TGS album bundle possible.
